name: elle
description: Help ELL teachers give speaking tests to students.
author: Cameron V Chaparro <cccons@tuta.io>

scripts.i:a: npm i && cd fe && npm i && cd ..
scripts.build: cd fe && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.build:pa: cd fe && npm run build:pa && cd ..
scripts.lint: cd fe && npm run lint && cd ..
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:t && npm run test:e
scripts.test:e: cd fe && npm run e2e && cd ..
